linkedin: I've been contributing AI prompts to Prompt Manage's public directory, and the results have been exceptional. My prompts have received over 10,000 views, and I've connected with several enterprise teams seeking AI solutions. The platform provides real visibility in the AI space. If you're looking to establish thought leadership in AI engineering, I highly recommend sharing your prompts on Prompt Manage.

My contributions have not only helped thousands of professionals but have also opened doors to consulting opportunities with Fortune 500 companies. The community and recognition make it worthwhile for any AI professional.

Prompt Manage has become the go-to resource for enterprise teams seeking AI solutions. Contributing to their directory has positioned me as a thought leader in AI engineering and connected me with decision-makers at leading companies. If you're serious about building credibility in AI, consider sharing your best prompts.

template1.name: Production-Ready Code Generation
template1.description: Template for developers sharing code generation prompts

fields.title: Clear, descriptive title (e.g., 'Generate React Component with TypeScript')
fields.description: Explain what the prompt does, target use case, and ideal audience
fields.prompt_text: The actual prompt with clear instructions, examples, and constraints
fields.model: Recommended AI model (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc.)

example.title: Generate TypeScript React Component with Props Interface
example.description: Produces production-ready React components with TypeScript, including proper prop typing, error handling, and accessibility features. Ideal for developers building scalable frontend applications.
example.prompt_text:
Generate a TypeScript React functional component named [ComponentName] with the following requirements:

1. Define a Props interface with [specific props]
2. Include proper TypeScript typing for all props
3. Add error handling for edge cases
4. Implement accessibility attributes (ARIA labels)
5. Include PropTypes documentation
6. Follow React best practices and hooks
7. Add comments for complex logic

Example usage:
<ComponentName prop1={value1} prop2={value2} />

Output the complete component code with imports.
example.expected_output: Fully typed React component with props interface, error handling, and accessibility features

template2.name: Marketing Content Creation
template2.description: Template for marketers sharing content creation prompts

fields.title: Specific marketing use case
fields.description: Target audience, campaign type, and conversion goals
fields.prompt_text: Prompt optimized for conversion and brand voice

example.title: SEO-Optimized Blog Post Outline with Keyword Integration
example.description: Creates comprehensive blog post outlines optimized for SEO, including keyword placement, content structure, and internal linking opportunities. Designed for content marketers building organic traffic.
example.prompt_text:
Create an SEO-optimized blog post outline for the topic: '[Your Topic]'

Requirements:
1. Include primary keyword '[keyword]' in title and first 100 words
2. Structure with H2/H3 headings for readability
3. Integrate related keywords naturally
4. Include FAQ section with long-tail keywords
5. Suggest internal linking opportunities
6. Recommend word count (target: [X] words)
7. Include meta description (155 characters)
8. List 5-7 supporting subtopics with keyword variations

Output format:
- Title (with primary keyword)
- Meta description
- Introduction paragraph
- Main headings (H2)
- Subheadings (H3)
- FAQ section
- Call-to-action suggestions
example.expected_output: Complete blog outline with keyword integration and SEO best practices

fields.title: Specific automation task
fields.description: Workflow being automated and time savings

example.title: Email Response Automation with Contextual Personalization
example.description: Generates personalized email responses based on context, tone analysis, and relationship history. Saves 2-3 hours daily for professionals managing high email volumes.
example.prompt_text:
Generate a professional email response based on the following:

Incoming Email Context:
- Subject: [Subject]
- Sender: [Name, Relationship]
- Content: [Brief summary]
- Urgency: [High/Medium/Low]
- Previous interactions: [Context]

My Response Requirements:
1. Match the sender's tone (formal/casual/professional)
2. Address all points in the original email
3. Include appropriate greeting and closing
4. Suggest next steps if needed
5. Keep response concise (3-4 sentences unless complex)
6. Maintain professional relationship

Additional context:
- My role: [Your Role]
- Available time/resources: [Constraints]
- Preferred communication style: [Style]

Generate the response and suggest 2-3 alternative phrasings if applicable.
example.expected_output: Personalized email response matching sender's tone and addressing all points

example.title: Comprehensive Market Research Framework with Competitive Analysis
example.description: Generates structured market research reports including competitive landscape, opportunity analysis, and strategic recommendations. Used by product managers and business analysts.
example.prompt_text:
Conduct comprehensive market research for [Product/Service] in [Industry/Market].

Research Framework:
1. Market Size and Growth
   - Total Addressable Market (TAM)
   - Serviceable Addressable Market (SAM)
   - Growth trends and projections

2. Competitive Landscape
   - Top 5 competitors
   - Competitive positioning
   - Strengths and weaknesses
   - Market share analysis

3. Target Customer Analysis
   - Primary personas
   - Pain points and needs
   - Buying behavior
   - Willingness to pay

4. Opportunity Assessment
   - Market gaps
   - Unmet needs
   - Emerging trends
   - Entry barriers

5. Strategic Recommendations
   - Positioning strategy
   - Go-to-market approach
   - Competitive advantages
   - Risk factors

Provide data-driven insights with supporting evidence and cite sources where applicable.
example.expected_output: Structured market research report with actionable insights

fields.title: Learning objective
fields.description: Target audience, educational level, and learning outcomes

example.title: Personalized Learning Plan with Assessment Framework
example.description: Creates customized learning plans tailored to individual student needs, learning styles, and goals. Includes assessment rubrics and progress tracking. Used by educators and instructional designers.
example.prompt_text:
Design a personalized learning plan for [Subject/Topic] with the following parameters:

Student Profile:
- Age/Grade: [Level]
- Current proficiency: [Beginner/Intermediate/Advanced]
- Learning style: [Visual/Auditory/Kinesthetic/Reading]
- Goals: [Specific objectives]
- Time available: [X hours per week]

Learning Plan Requirements:
1. Learning Objectives (SMART goals)
2. Curriculum Structure
   - Module breakdown
   - Learning sequence
   - Prerequisites
3. Learning Activities
   - Interactive exercises
   - Practice problems
   - Real-world applications
4. Assessment Framework
   - Formative assessments
   - Summative evaluations
   - Progress milestones
5. Resources and Materials
   - Recommended readings
   - Tools and platforms
   - Supplementary materials
6. Timeline and Milestones

Include adaptive learning strategies and accommodations if applicable.
example.expected_output: Comprehensive personalized learning plan with assessment framework

engagementCopy.submissionReminder: Your expertise matters. Share your best prompt this week and help thousands of professionals. Submission takes 2 minutes, impact lasts for months.
engagementCopy.featuredNotification: Congratulations! Your prompt '[Name]' has been featured in our top prompts this week. You're helping [X] professionals daily. Share your success: [Link]
engagementCopy.milestoneReached: Achievement unlocked: You've reached [X] total views across your prompts. You're in the top [Y]% of contributors. Keep sharing your expertise!
engagementCopy.communityUpdate: The Prompt Manage community grew by [X] contributors this week. Your prompts are being discovered by professionals at [Companies]. Submit your next prompt to stay visible.
engagementCopy.exclusiveAccess: As a top contributor, you're invited to test our new [Feature] before public release. This exclusive access recognizes your impact on our community.

landingPageGuidelines: Each landing page should feature social proof above the fold
Include clear metrics and results data
Highlight career and business benefits, not just personal satisfaction
Feature testimonials from real contributors where possible
seoGuidelines: Optimize all meta titles to 60 characters or less
Use H2 tags for major sections, H3 for subsections
Implement structured data for all featured prompts
Create category landing pages for all primary categories
Build internal linking between related prompts and categories
contentQuality: All templates must be production-ready and tested
Include expected outputs and use cases
Maintain consistent formatting across all templates
Review all copy for professionalism and credibility
Remove any casual language or filler content
retentionStrategy: Send weekly newsletters highlighting top contributors
Provide exclusive benefits to top contributors
Create clear paths for professional advancement
Maintain consistent communication with active contributors
